summary: A suite of unit tests that validate a wide range of text‑processing utilities, checking their behavior for compression, lazy formatting, list extraction, filename sanitization, newline handling, phone‑to‑numeric conversion, slug generation, smart splitting, character and word truncation (including HTML aware truncation), entity unescaping, string literal unescaping, and line wrapping.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of core text helper functions used throughout the system, catching regressions and confirming they handle edge cases as expected.
